item.title: 70. Andrea Morales Coto
item.dc:creator: Alex Roberts
item.description:
Design strategist Andrea Morales Coto is bringing the magic of live-action game design to new avenues, from distribution methods to cryptoeconomic systems and beyond. Learn along with Alex! Andrea’s Website Andrea on Twitter “I Owe Us” cryptoeconomic prototype “Following the Green Light: Designing Inclusion in Game Distribution The Golden Cobra Game Design Challenge

The post 70. Andrea Morales Coto appeared first on The One Shot Podcast.

item.title: Character Evolution Cast E06 – Session Zero with Amelia and Ryan
item.dc:creator: Character Creation Cast
item.description:
On this episode of Character Evolution Cast, we sit down with… just ourselves? Amelia and Ryan discuss what makes a good session zero and what sorts of things you need to keep in mind as both a player and a GM to help enhance the experience! We even have our own Session Zero worksheet in...

The post Character Evolution Cast E06 – Session Zero with Amelia and Ryan appeared first on The One Shot Podcast.

item.title: S01E27 – OOC Q&A
item.dc:creator: The Broadswords
item.description:
Victoria is sick and was unable to get the finale edited, so here is an older Q&A episode the broads recorded for Patreon. The broads answer questions ranging from what Yllairies carries in her trunks to how they found each other. Never fear, the finale will be up on Saturday, November 3rd.

The post S01E27 – OOC Q&A appeared first on The One Shot Podcast.

item.title: 63. Mission: Accomplished! with Jeff Stormer
item.dc:creator: Meghan Dornbrock
item.description:
Jeff is back to talk about his own game this time, Mission: Accomplished! It’s about super spies, office meetings, and really coming face to face with the arcane horror that is your day job. We talk about comedy in games, designing around secret information, and the impact of having winners and losers in an RPG....

The post 63. Mission: Accomplished! with Jeff Stormer appeared first on The One Shot Podcast.

item.title: Sky Jacks: Episode 2
item.dc:creator: James D'Amato
item.description:
The crew negotiates with Sonja. They have to smooth over the captain’s romantic transgressions and secure work for themselves all without letting everyone know he’s dead. What they don’t know is that working with Sonja might get them killed too. MUSIC Arne Parrott “Division” Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/...

item.title: Sky Jacks: Episode 1
item.dc:creator: James D'Amato
item.description:
Meet the crew of The Uhuru, a Sky Ship under the banner of the notorious captain Orimar Vale! His name is feared by Red Feather captains and privateers alike. However, Jonnit Kessler, Travis Matagot, Dref Wormwood, and Gable share a secret about him that no one else knows… MUSIC Arne Parrot INSPIRATION The Decemberists Illimat...

item.title: Series 9.3 – Spire with Grant Howitt (Discussion)
item.dc:creator: Character Creation Cast
item.description:
Welcome to the final episode in the 9th series! On today’s episode, we sit down with Grant Howitt, co-creator for Spire, to discuss how character creation went for this amazing game! Announcements: Strata Kickstarter: It’s here! https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/gshowitt/strata-a-spire-rpg-sourcebook AcadeCon: http://www.acadecon.com Discord: https://discord.charactercreationcast.com Character Creation Cast on Apple Podcasts (The best place to leave reviews for us)!...

item.title: 69. Jeff Stormer
item.dc:creator: Alex Roberts
item.description:
Podcaster and Unofficial Larpwright of the Olive Garden chain of restaurants Jeff Stormer joins us for a nice chat about professional wrestling, karaoke, and other roleplaying games. Jeff’s Website When You’re Here, You’re Family Alex’s Guest Spot on the Party of One Podcast Big Bad Con 2018
